title: Keyboard Troubles
body: I was playing a game of League not to long ago and while i was in the game my keyboard just stopped working and i have kept playing games and it has not changed does anyone know what i need to do i really need help.

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this issue? Does your keyboard continue to function outside of League and in other games?
only in league need help ASAP

Did you make any modifications to your League files? Your input settings may be completely borked, so I recommend taking the following steps to see if your file was the culprit.

**Log into the League Client** then hop into your Config folder, which should be in your the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, hop into a custom match so you can confirm whether the changes went through or not. Please let me know if this fixed the problem for ya.
where is the config folder cant find it sorry to get back to you so late

It should be in the directory I listed above (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config). Just start from *My computer* and navigate from there.

I hope that helped!
I keep trying to play games and I have {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} spent alot of time on this account so I don't know what to do my keyboard just stops working only when I play League

No it only malfunctions while i am in a game of League
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
